channel.title: Need help with giveitem command
channel.description:
hi,
I have a giveitem command, but when I do it and I only want to give a santa to 1 person, but it gives everyone a santa.
How ca I fix this? It's a 517 server with codeusa base.
please help me
thank you,
startcode
